parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the GTM instance that you want to query.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language used by the user.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **20**.
